alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Laclede; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 2:58AM CST until February 27 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CST FOR EASTERN WEBSTER...WRIGHT...WESTERN DOUGLAS AND WESTERN LACLEDE COUNTIES... At 258 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lebanon to 7 miles east of Niangua to near Seymour to 10 miles southwest of Ava, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Ava, Seymour, Morgan, Mansfield, Conway, Norwood, Hartville, Niangua, Duncan, Diggins, Phillipsburg, Stoutland, Twin Bridges, Competition, Brushyknob, Grovespring, Rome, Rader and Goodhope. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 110 and 143. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
